title: Dalila Demo
description: Custom made management suite developed for Florería Dalila (Concepción, Chile). Sales and delivery management. Demo version. Warning: The demo version handles user forms in a separate URL, which currently has a revoked SSL certificate.

title: Custom Tatoeba Utils
description: Miscellaneous utilities built with data from the public language corpus at tatoeba.org. At the present, the only deployed utility is a word scramble quiz game where the user can attempt to translate a sentence using word prompts.

title: Hacker News Feed
description: A news aggregator taking articles from a public API at hn.algolia.com.

title: My Personal Portfolio
description: The very same your browsing right now.
